column19: 30 non words, ranging from 2 to 4 syllables each. Each category of syllables included 10 non words. Half of the non words were similar to real words (target-like) and half were not similar (non target-like).
column25: A lot of missing data: I don't know how you deducted the score of 55 for the 3-4 syllables itemms. By the graph, I'll see more than 55.
I derived the overall NWR scores of the high- (88%) and mid- (75) SES group; the composite score is obtained controlling for the samples sizes of the the two groups
